body.p:
Review Tasks is one of the two main components (along with Projects) within the Content Fusion browser interface. There are two main types of review task users, Reviewers and Task Owners:
Task Owners - Can create and manage review tasks from the browser interface or in Oxygen XML Editor/Author. They have access to task settings, share options, and they can ultimately merge proposed changes into their project.
Reviewers - Can use a link that is shared with them by a task owner to open documents from a review task in an online visual editor where they can proofread, add comments, and make changes.
